High blood pressure. ? Also pregnant women tend to get light headed and faint due to the extra blood volume in there body. Be careful with standing up to fast or to long. Be careful with fast movements and bending over frequently .. Unfortunately if its not a medical thing like ur heart or high blood presuure its just one of those things we have to deal with for now.
